newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Pleasanton USD, Calif. $10 mln GO.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Pleasanton USD, Calif. $10 mln GO.

text.p: General Obligation Bonds, 1997 Election, Series A
NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN, pursuant to the Act Section 15146, that the Board of Supervisors of the County of Alameda, State of California, invites bids on not to exceed
$10,000,000 principal amount of Pleasanton Unified School District (Alameda County, California), General Obligation Bonds, 1997 Election, Series A, at public sale. Bids will be received on

and (without further advertising) so long as a proposal has not been theretofore accepted or notice to the contrary is given, on each succeeding Tuesday at 9:30 a.m., at Jones Hall Hill & White, Four Embarcadero Center, 19th Floor, San Francisco, California 94111, and the sale will be awarded by the Treasurer of the County of Alameda pursuant to the order of the Board of Supervisors of Alameda County within twenty- six (26) hours after the time prescribed for receipt of bids. Further information, including copies of the preliminary Official Statement, Official Notice of Sale and form of Bid Proposal, may be obtained from Kelling, Northcross & Nobriga, Inc., at 1333 Broadway, Suite 1000, Oakland, California 94612, (510) 839-8200.
